name: Sombrio Highline Shorts - Men's
description: Get everything dialed for all-mountain riding. DWR to shed muck, stupendous stretch and adjustable waist  make these a go-to option for downhill bombing.Lightweight 4-way stretch polyester and spandex.DWR finish repels moisture and mud.Locking zip fly with hidden snap and Velcro.Seamless crotch.Bar tack stitching throughout stress zones.Adjustable waistband.Laser cut ventilation in lumbar and thighs.Front and rear zippered pockets, 1 with keycord.Machine wash cold, do not bleach, tumble dry low, do not iron.Slim fit.
